content: wiki waki woo designed by adrienne fong shown in wisdom yarn miami hialeah colorway i love playing with lace and stripey yarn so much fun almost as much fun as saying wiki waki woo wiki waki woo copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry wiki waki woo designed by adrienne fong i love playing with lace and stripey yarn so much fun almost as much fun as saying wiki waki woo size second to medium and last to large the size of the sock can be adjusted by using a smaller or larger needle for a different gauge abbreviations sl - slip as if to purl unless otherwise noted m1 - make 1 knitter s choice yo - yarn-over ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to purl insert left needle through the front loops of the two slipped stitches and knit them together k2tog/p2tog - knit/purl 2 stitches together tbl through back loop wyif with yarn in front pm place marker shown in wisdom yarns miami 459 yds/100 gm - work group of stitches between hialeah colorway brackets for specified number of times size woman s small medium large - 7 8 9 inch ankle instructions materials cuff using the german twisted cast on 100 gm light fingering weight yarn loosely cast on 60 64 72 stitches divide us size 1 5 2 5 mm needles or size stitches onto 4 dpns one or two circulars as to knit to gauge per your own preference join being careful stitch markers not to twist the stitches place marker to tapestry needle indicate beginning of round knit one round purl one round once knit one round work gauge 8 5 sts/inch & 12 row/inch in k2p2 ribbing for 12 rounds stockinette set up for leg notes small k5 m1 k10 m1 5 times k5 66 when more than one number is sts given the first applies to the small medium k4 m1 k8 m1 7 times k4 72 wiki waki woo copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry sts gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each large k6 m1 k12 m1 5 times k6 78 slipped stitch along side of heel pm to sts indicate start of instep work 33 36 39 instep stitches in pattern as established chart b pm to indicate end of instep pick leg work rounds 1-12 of chart a for a up and knit same number of stitches along total of 5 repeats work rounds 1-2 once remaining side of heel knit 9 10 11 more pm to indicate start of heel flap p33 stitches and place marker the beginning of 36 39 sts pm to indicate start of instep the round is now the middle of the heel flap p33 36 39 sts place instep stitches on holder work set-up for heel flap round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches
